name: Orion Kliff
description:
-- In Development! --

Orion Kliff is a game you can play alone or with a friend. You can use spells and abilities to defeat the vine golems who are protecting a nature's secret. 

  In single-player mode, you must choose between the mage, a human with lots of spells and mana limitation, and the owl, whit's the mage's familiar and uses melee weapons to protect him. For now, in multi-player mode, the host is always the mage. 

To play multi-player, you must open steam before start the game!
